original_text: You may have said things secretly, in the dark of the night. But one day, people will hear those things in the light of day. You may have said things quietly into someone's ear, behind a door that you have shut. But one day, people will shout out those secrets loudly from the tops of the houses.
korean_text: 이러므로 너희가 어두운 데서 말한 모든 것이 광명한 데서 들리고 너희가 골방에서 귀에 대고 말한 것이 지붕 위에서 전파되리라

sentences.original_text: You may have said things secretly
in the dark of the night
But one day, people will hear those things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어느 날, 사람들은 그것들을 들을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You may have said things quietly
behind a door that you have shut
But one day, people will shout out those secrets loudly
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어느 날, 사람들은 그 비밀들을 크게 외칠 것입니다

sentences.original_text: from the tops of the houses
